entry.title: FANTASTIC - Nature Pack
entry.content:
A lowpoly nature asset pack with over 110 unique assets to create stylized environments for your fantasy game.

If you are in need of high quality stylized nature assets - this package is perfect for you!

The assets are compatible with Unity Terrain, which makes it easy for you to quickly and efficiently create what you envision. With customizable water and foliage shaders you can adjust the mood and season of your environment to your liking.


Compatible with Unity 6.


Contains day and night demo scenes as seen in the trailer and a documentation to get you started!

As a FREE bonus this package includes the Camping Set!



Features:


3D Assets:

  • 12 unique trees which can be customized with 5 different tree trunk textures
  • 15 stones
  • 44 plants with vertex maps for wind movement
  • 22 Camping Set assets (pot, campfire & poles, wooden spoon/bowl/cup, fishing rod, fish & fish slice, metal plate, 3x decorational leaves, glass bottle, bread, cheese, knife, pan & lid, sleeping bag, tent, woodpile & woodlog)

Trees and stones each have 3 LODs. Each asset has a custom lightmap in its second UV channel and colliders where needed.



Shaders:


Custom shaders were created with Amplify

  • Customizable shader for water
  • Customizable wind shaders for foliage
  • Simple double sided shader for built-in RP

FX:

  • Stylized particle effect for fire, steam, flying leaves and fireflies


Follow us for news

Web | Twitter | Facebook


Have a look at our other packs

STORY - 3D Packs Series

FANTASTIC - 3D Packs Series

entry.title: FANTASTIC - Nature Pack
entry.content:
一个低多边形自然资产包，包含超过110个独特资产，用于为您的幻想游戏创建风格化环境。

如果您需要高质量的风格化自然资产——这个包非常适合您！

这些资产与Unity Terrain兼容，使您能够快速高效地创建您所设想的环境。通过可自定义的水和植被着色器，您可以根据自己的喜好调整环境的氛围和季节。

与Unity 6兼容。

包含如预告片中所示的昼夜演示场景和帮助您入门的文档！

作为免费赠品，此包还包括露营套件！

特点：

3D资产：

  • 12种独特的树木，可以使用5种不同的树干纹理进行自定义
  • 15块石头
  • 44种植物，具有风动的顶点贴图
  • 22个露营套件资产（锅、篝火和杆子、木勺/碗/杯、钓鱼竿、鱼和鱼片、金属盘、3个装饰性叶子、玻璃瓶、面包、奶酪、刀、锅和盖子、睡袋、帐篷、木堆和木材）

树木和石头各有3个LOD。每个资产在其第二个UV通道中都有自定义光照贴图，并在需要的地方有碰撞体。

着色器：

使用Amplify创建了自定义着色器

  • 可自定义的水着色器
  • 可自定义的植被风着色器
  • 适用于内置渲染管线的简单双面着色器

特效：

  • 风格化的粒子效果，包括火、蒸汽、飞舞的叶子和萤火虫

关注我们以获取最新消息

网站 | 推特 | 脸书


查看我们的其他资源包

故事 - 3D资源包系列

奇幻 - 3D资源包系列

entry.title: Low Poly Water - Poseidon
entry.content:
Low poly water shader with vertex animation, wave, light absorption, foam, reflection, refraction, caustic and fullscreen effect (underwater, wet lens). Support Unity 6.

Poseidon is a user friendly water system to help you create impressive water-scapes, deeply focused on low-poly and stylized worlds, which can run smoothly on both PC, Mobile and VR devices, save you a lot of time and effort!

Poseidon supports the Universal and Built-in Render Pipeline, with various settings for you to customize. Those features can be easily turn on and off with simple toggles.


CORE VALUES

• Optimal performance.

• Highly customizable.

• Professional customer service.


CORE FEATURES

• Super easy to learn: Getting started in no time, with all-in-one-place editor, in-depth document.

• Robust mesh generation: Water mesh is generated automatically with different patterns and different forms, including Tileable Plane, Area, Spline and Custom Mesh, which mean it can scale well from open water, lakes to curvy rivers and streams.

• Various lighting setup: While packed with Specular PBR lighting for the highest fidelity, it also provides Blinn-Phong and Lambert light mode for maximize performance on Mobile devices without sacrifice much on quality.

• Fresnel: Realistic reflection/refraction blending model based on view angle.

• Ripple: Breath live to your scene with water movements.

• Wave: Wavy summer beach under the sun, isn't it great?.

• Light absorption: Light rays getting absorbed when they go deeper into the water body.

• Foam: Highlight the intersection between water and other geometry, as well as wave crest and river flow and waterfalls.

• Planar reflection: Stunning scenery with those mountains and sky reflected onto water surface (temporarily not supported in URP due to recursive rendering limitation, we're actively looking for an alternative).

• Refraction: See how lovely life is going below the water.

• Caustic: Impressive scattering effect, with no projector in used.

• Underwater and wet lens camera effects: bring the sense of going in and out of water body.

• Support for VR: Most effects work well on VR. Only support Single Pass Instanced stereo rendering. Tested on Oculus Rift S. See VR Checklist for detail.

• Queryable: Retrieve vertex position at any position in the scene for creating buoyancy effect. (Buoyancy physics system is not included!)


SUPPORTED RENDER PIPELINES

• Standard RP.

• Universal RP.


MADE WITH POSEIDON

  • Beaten Path
  • Your game here!

COMPATIBILITY

• Polaris: Quickly setup water plane that fit in to your low poly level with a couple of clicks.


LIMITATION

• For some reasons, the asset does not fully work with Oculus Quest (Multiview).


REQUIREMENTS

• Unity 2021.3+

• Support Unity 6


POLARIS LOW POLY ECOSYSTEM

Not only about the water, it's everything you need to create a gorgeous Low Poly level.

• Polaris - Low Poly Terrain Engine.

• Poseidon - Low Poly Water System.

• Jupiter - Procedural Sky.


DOCUMENTATION

Manual


COMMUNITY

Website | Facebook | YouTube | Discord


NOTE

Some assets in the screenshots such as terrain and sky are NOT included in this package.


OUR NEWEST PRODUCT

Vista - An advanced procedural terrain editor using graph-based and non-destructive workflow, with a robust biome system. It give you total control in your hands to create lively terrains with realistic simulations.

entry.title: Low Poly Water - Poseidon
entry.content:
Low poly water shader with vertex animation, wave, light absorption, foam, reflection, refraction, caustic and fullscreen effect (underwater, wet lens). Support Unity 6.

越来越厌倦不适用于 URP 的水资源，却苦于没有替代品？Poseidon 可以满足你的一切所需！


Poseidon 是一个用户友好的水系统，支持创建壮观的水景，高度关注低多边形和风格化世界，可以在 PC 端、移动端和 VR 设备上流畅运行，省时省力！

Poseidon 是第一个完全支持通用和内置渲染管线的系统，具有多种可以自定义的设置。这些功能可以通过简单的切换轻松开启和关闭。


核心价值

• 性能优化。

• 高度可自定义。

• 专业的客户服务。


核心功能

• 超级易学：快速入门，提供功能齐全的编辑器和深入详细的文档。

•  强大的网格生成功能：自动生成具有各种图案和形态的水网格，包括 可平铺平面、区域、样条图和自定义网格，这意味着，从开放水域、湖泊到蜿蜒的河流和小溪，它都可以自如缩放。

•  各种光照设置：它与镜面 PBR 光照一起实现最高保真度，同时提供冯氏光照和 Lambert 光照模式，实现在移动设备上的最佳性能，而无需牺牲过多的质量。（Lambert /冯氏光照模式仅支持 URP）

• 菲涅耳：基于视角的逼真反射/折射混合模型。

• 波纹：水的移动让你的场景栩栩如生。

• 波浪：阳光下波光粼粼的夏日海滩，是不是特别棒？

•  光吸收：光线在深入水体时会被吸收。

• 泡沫：突出水和其他几何体以及波峰、河流流水和瀑布之间的交叉。

• 平面反射：山脉和天空倒映在水面上的壮观景色。

• 折射：了解水下丰富多姿的生活。

• 焦散：令人震撼的散射效果，无需任何投影器。

• 水下和湿镜摄像机效果：营造进入和离开水体的感觉。

• 支持 VR：大多数效果均可在 VR 上良好呈现。仅支持单通道实例化立体渲染。已在 Oculus Rift S 上测试。详情请参见 VR 核对表。


支持渲染管线

• 标准 RP。

• 通用渲染管线 (2019.3+)。


兼容性

• Polaris V2：单击几下即可快速设置水面，以融入你的低多边形关卡。


要求

• Unity 2019.1+


正在开发中

• 流动贴图。


POLARIS 低多边形生态系统

不仅包括水，其中还包括创建美妙的低多边形关卡所需的一切功能。

• Polaris V2 - 低多边形地形引擎。

• Poseidon - 低多边形水系统。

• Jupiter - 程序化天空。


文档

用户手册


社区

Facebook | YouTube |论坛| Discord


了解更多

先试后买


注

屏幕截图中的某些资源（如地形和天空）不包含在该资源包中。

entry.title: Stylized Water 2
entry.content:
Highly customizable to suit your art direction through various parameters. This package focuses on providing artistic freedom, rather than a realistic water simulation. Easy to use and self-documented

📄 Documentation | 🟣 Discord | 💬 Forum | 🕹 Android Demo | ⚙️ Compatibility


« Compatible with Unity 2021 through 2023.2. A backwards-compatibility patch for 2020.3 may be requested through email (multi-entity licenses only). »


🎁 An upgrade to Stylized Water 3 for Unity 6 is available at a 25% discount.


The successor to the widely adopted, original, Stylized Water 1 asset. Now re-imagined from the ground up for the Universal Render Pipeline.


Built on over 8 years of experience developing water rendering, both on the asset store and for commercial projects, ready to take advantage of. This asset targets both basic and intermediate uses of water in games.


🏄🏽‍♀️ Rundown

Rather than being stricly PBR-based, a custom lighting model offers direct control over color and light/environment reflections. All whilst retaining correct dynamic lighting behaviour, and support for Unity's native lighting features.


This asset is perfect for both beginners and experts alike, and can serve a range of different applications and styles. UX/UI is a core focus, making this straightforward to use. Extensive documentation is available, and regularly improved upon.


💧 Shading features:

• Unlit, Simple and Advanced shading modes (spanning low- and high-end graphics)

• Deep, shallow and horizon color controls

• Intersection foam effect with opaque geometry, based on scene-depth or vertex colors

• Adjustable surface foam

• GPU-driven, layered wave animations

• Animated caustics in shallow water

• Translucency rendering from all light types

• Flat shading mode (low poly look)

• Control over Directional and Point/Spot light reflections.

• Separate control over environment reflections

• Sparkles based on normal map

• Refraction, distorts objects behind the water surface

• UV- or world-projected tiling (seamless water)

• Vertex color support to control foam, underwater fog and wave height

• Transparency mask to hide the water inside objects such as boats

• River mode, for directional animations and slope-based foam.

• Distance normals (tiling reduction)


⚙️ Technical features:

• Clean, accordion-style, material UI with tooltips and notifcations

• Tessellation support, dynamically subdivides triangles (adaptive & distance-based)

• C# API to read the wave height/normal.

• Planar Reflections Renderer component, robustly designed and scalable.

• Screen-Space (raytraced) Reflections, implemented as a direct shader effect.

• Water Grid component, creates water tiles which can follow a specific transform/camera

• Utility to create subdivided plane/circle mesh assets

• Custom time and world offset C# API (for network syncronized waves + floating origin systems)


📦 Includes:

• Tropical beach demo scene

• Several pre-configured water materials

• Several foam and normal map textures (original)

• Set of particle effects, designed for gameplay and environment enhancement (flipbooks with normal maps)


✔️ Compatibility:

• Universal Render Pipeline (URP) 10.3.2+ (excluding the Built-in RP & HDRP)

• PC, macOS, Xbox, Playstation, Nintendo Switch, Android/iOS and WebGL 2.0

• DirectX, Metal, Vulkan and OpenGL (3.0+).

• Automatic fog integration for: SC Post Effects, Enviro, Azure Sky, Atmospheric Height Fog, COZY Weather and Buto 2021/2022. No code changes required!

• Curved World 2020 support

• Integrable with Dynamic Water Physics 2

• Supports spot/point lights and baked/dynamic GI

• Network-syncronized waves/animations are possible.

• Floating Origin systems are compatible.

• Orthographic camera's

• VR rendering (both Single Pass Instanced & Multiview)

• Full details...


⚡ Performance:

Hand-written, expertly crafted shader, for maximum performance and complete flexibility.


Features can be disabled, making it scalable to use on mobile platforms. Down from a simple colored plane up to a vivid animated lake.


🚧 Restrictions:

• Built for 3D rendering. Can't be used with the 2D Renderer or Tilemaps

• Planar reflections aren't VR-compatible (other techniques work fine)

• Not ideal for planetary rendering (texture seams would be unavoidable)


➕ Available extension assets:

  • Underwater Rendering, seamless waterline rendering and underwater fog
  • Dynamic Effects, enables advanced effects such as ripples and shoreline waves

🎁 30% upgrade discount for users of Stylized Water 1 (automatically applies on checkout if already licensed)


[ Asset Store Refund policy ]

entry.title: Stylized Water 2
entry.content:
高度可定制，以适应您的艺术方向，通过各种参数。此包专注于提供艺术自由，而不是现实的水模拟。易于使用并自我文档化。

📄 文档 | 🟣 Discord | 💬 论坛 | 🕹 安卓演示 | ⚙️ 兼容性

« 兼容 Unity 2021 至 2023.2. 可以通过电子邮件请求 2020.3 的向后兼容补丁（仅限多实体许可证）。 »

🎁 可享受25%折扣的 Stylized Water 3 升级，适用于 Unity 6。

广泛采用的原始 Stylized Water 1 资产的继任者。现在为通用渲染管线重新构想。

基于超过8年的水渲染开发经验，无论是在资产商店还是商业项目中，准备好利用这一点。此资产针对游戏中水的基本和中级使用。


🏄🏽‍♀️ 概述

与严格基于PBR（物理基础渲染）不同，自定义光照模型提供了对颜色和光线/环境反射的直接控制。同时保持正确的动态光照行为，并支持Unity的本地光照特性。

该资产非常适合初学者和专家，并可以用于多种不同的应用和风格。用户体验/用户界面是核心重点，使其易于使用。提供了广泛的文档，并定期进行改进。

💧 着色特性：

• 无光照、简单和高级着色模式（涵盖低端和高端图形）

• 深色、浅色和地平线颜色控制

• 与不透明几何体的交叉泡沫效果，基于场景深度或顶点颜色

• 可调表面泡沫

• 基于GPU的分层波浪动画

• 浅水中的动画光晕

• 支持所有光源类型的半透明渲染

• 平面着色模式（低多边形外观）

• 对方向光和点光/聚光灯反射的控制。

• 对环境反射的单独控制

• 基于法线贴图的闪光效果

• 折射，扭曲水面下的物体

• UV或世界投影的平铺（无缝水面）

• 顶点颜色支持，用于控制泡沫、水下雾和波浪高度

• 透明度遮罩，用于隐藏船只等物体内部的水

• 河流模式，用于方向动画和基于坡度的泡沫。

• 距离法线（平铺减少）


⚙️ 技术特性：

• 干净的手风琴式材料用户界面，带有工具提示和通知

• 支持细分曲面，动态细分三角形（自适应和基于距离）

• C# API 用于读取波浪高度/法线。

• 平面反射渲染器组件，设计稳健且可扩展。

• 屏幕空间（光线追踪）反射，作为直接着色器效果实现。

• 水网格组件，创建可以跟随特定变换/相机的水块

• 创建细分平面/圆形网格资产的工具

• 自定义时间和世界偏移的 C# API（用于网络同步波浪 + 漂浮原点系统）

📦 包含：

• 热带海滩演示场景

• 几种预配置的水材质

• 几种泡沫和法线贴图纹理（原始）

• 一组粒子效果，旨在增强游戏玩法和环境（带法线贴图的翻页书）


✔️ 兼容性：

• 通用渲染管线 (URP) 10.3.2+ (不包括 内置渲染管线 & HDRP)

• PC、macOS、Xbox、Playstation、Nintendo Switch、Android/iOS 和 WebGL 2.0

• 支持 DirectX、Metal、Vulkan 和 OpenGL (3.0+).

• 自动雾效集成支持： SC 后期效果、Enviro、Azure Sky、大气高度雾、COZY 天气 和 Buto 2021/2022。无需代码更改！

• Curved World 2020 支持

• 可与 动态水物理 2 集成

• 支持聚光灯/点光源和烘焙/动态全局光照

• 支持网络同步波浪/动画。

• 浮动原点系统兼容。

• 正交相机

• VR 渲染（单通道实例化和多视图均支持）

• 完整详情...

⚡ 性能：

手工编写，精心制作的着色器，旨在实现最大性能和完全灵活性。


可以禁用某些功能，使其可扩展以在移动平台上使用。从简单的彩色平面到生动的动画湖泊。

🚧 限制：

• 为3D渲染而构建。无法与2D渲染器或瓦片地图一起使用

• 平面反射不支持虚拟现实（其他技术正常工作）

• 不适合行星渲染（纹理接缝是不可避免的）

➕ 可用扩展资产：

  • 水下渲染，无缝水线渲染和水下雾效
  • 动态效果，启用涟漪和海岸波浪等高级效果

🎁 Stylized Water 1用户享有30%的升级折扣（如果已获得许可，结账时会自动应用）

[ 资产商店退款政策 ]

entry.title: Dynamic Mesh Combiner
entry.content:
A powerful tool that seamlessly combines either skinned or regular mesh renderers. It allows for both animated and static output with support for LODs* and dynamic object manipulation.

Dynamic Mesh Combiner will help optimize the performance of all your 3D models while still maintaining visual quality. Whether you're working on a mobile game, a PC game, or a VR project, Dynamic Mesh Combiner is the ultimate tool for reducing draw calls and improving performance in your Unity project.


To start combining, simply add the 'MC Mesh Combiner' component to the root game object and 'MC Combinable' or 'MC LOD Combinable' to any child renderers that you want to combine. The asset will take care of the rest automatically and will update if the objects are moved!


If you'd like to try out Dynamic Mesh Combiner to see if it’s the right fit for your project, we offer a free demo version that you can try out before purchase: Demo


Works well with these outline assets:

  • Ultimate Outlines & Highlights
  • Easy Performant Outline
  • Highlight Plus - All in One Outline & Selection Effects

Feel free to consult the documentation before use or join our discord server if you have any questions!

entry.title: Dynamic Mesh Combiner
entry.content:
A powerful tool that seamlessly combines either skinned or regular mesh renderers. It allows for both animated and static output with support for LODs* and dynamic object manipulation.

动态网格合并器将帮助优化您所有3D模型的性能，同时保持视觉质量。无论您是在开发移动游戏、PC游戏还是VR项目，动态网格合并器都是减少绘制调用和提高Unity项目性能的终极工具。

要开始合并，只需将“MC网格合并器”组件添加到根游戏对象，并将“MC可合并”或“MC LOD可合并”添加到您想要合并的任何子渲染器。该资产将自动处理其余部分，并在对象移动时进行更新！

如果您想尝试动态网格合并器，以查看它是否适合您的项目，我们提供了一个免费演示版本，您可以在购买前试用：演示

与以下轮廓资产兼容良好：

  • 终极轮廓与高亮
  • 易于高效的轮廓
  • 高亮加 - 一体化轮廓与选择效果

在使用前，请随时查阅文档，或加入我们的Discord服务器，如果您有任何问题！

entry.title: POLYGON Modular Fantasy Hero Characters - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty

link.href: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/POLYGON Modular Fantasy Hero Characters - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty/ignore-index-en/

entry.id: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/POLYGON Modular Fantasy Hero Characters - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty/ignore-index-en/

content.xml:base: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/POLYGON Modular Fantasy Hero Characters - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty/ignore-index-en/

entry.content:
◼ Synty Discord Community ◼

Jump in to our Discord to Learn, Create and Share!


Synty Studios™ Presents -

POLYGON - Modular Fantasy Hero Characters

A low poly Modular Character asset pack to create characters for your fantasy game or make a character creator for your players to make their own hero.


◼ Key Features ◼

- 720 modular pieces with a custom shader to change colors

- Demo scene included with random character generator script

- Male and Female versions of each body part (not including unisex parts)

- Capes rigged to work with Dynamic Bone

- 120 Premade characters from the modular parts (5 Presets for Fixed scale character)

- Static versions for in game pick ups and use for UI etc


◼ Assets ◼

Modular Character Assets

- Hair, Heads, Eyebrows, Facial Hair, Hats, Masks, Helmets, Torsos, Hips, Legs, Arms, Hands, Knee pads, Shoulder pads, Elbow Pads, Hip Attachments, Bags, Capes etc


Weapon Assets

- Axe, Dagger, Jousts, Maces, Shields, Shields, Staffs, Swords, Knives etc


◼ Compatibility ◼

- Supports Universal Render Pipeline (URP) - URP Guide Here

- Characters are setup to work with Mecanim (no animations included in this pack)


📜 Synty Newsletter 📜

Don't miss out on release discounts!

Sign up to our Synty Asset Store Newsletter


Follow us for updates, promotions, previews & tutorials:

DISCORD | FACEBOOK | YOUTUBE |  TWITTER | INSTAGRAM

entry.title: POLYGON Modular Fantasy Hero Characters - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty
entry.content:
🔔 SYNTY STUDIOS 公告 🔔
POLYGON - 幻想王国 - 现已推出！

Synty Studios™ presents -
POLYGON - 模块化幻想英雄角色
一个低多边形模块化角色资源包，为您的幻想游戏创建角色，也可制作角色创建器供玩家创建自己的英雄。

◼ 主要特点 ◼

- 720 个模块化部件，带有可改变颜色的自定义着色器
- 包含随机角色剧本生成器的演示场景
- 每个身体部位的男女版本（不包括中性部位）
- 适用于动态骨骼的披风
- 模块化部件的 120 个预制角色
- 游戏中可选的静态版本，适用于 UI 等

◼ 资源 ◼

模块化角色资源
- 头发、头部、眉毛、面部毛发、帽子、遮罩、头盔、躯干、胯部、腿、手臂、手、护膝、垫肩、护肘、胯部附件、包、披风等

武器资源
- 斧头、匕首、长矛、锤矛、盾牌、盾牌、长杖、剑、刀等

◼ 兼容性 ◼

- 适用于 Unity 2019.1 及更高版本
- 通用渲染管线 (URP)
- 设置角色，与 Mecanim 一起使用（该资源包不包含动画）

◼ 其他资源 ◼

将此资源包与我们的其他幻想资源结合 -
- POLYGON Dungeons
- POLYGON 骑士
- POLYGON 幻想对手
- POLYGON 幻想角色

需要帮助？
EMAIL | FAQ | TUTORIALS | DISCORD

entry.title: Lumen: Stylized Light FX
entry.content:
Bring the light back into your project with Lumen: Stylized Light FX! Quickly prototype, save, recolor, and instantiate light flares and sun rays with the onboard tools.

CONNECT WITH US:

Website | Email | Discord | Playable Demo


Distant Lands presents:

Lumen: Stylized Light FX


Create beautiful stylized light effects ranging from light flares to halos to god rays to scatters! Lumen is a one-stop solution to stylized, performant volumetric lighting in stylized games.


Features THREE DIFFERENT SYSTEMS of light that work together to dramatically stylize your game worlds:


Do the lights in your scene feel lackluster? Do you want your audience to feel the warmth of the lights in your game? LUMEN LIGHT FLARES add a subtle halo to the lights in your scene providing an effect similar to that of volumetric point lights. This effect can be turned to the extreme as well filling your scenes with majestic glow and powerful auras—a must for any mystical item that your players may encounter!


The LUMEN STATIC RAYS are a simple way to achieve any sort of volumetric ray. Godrays, sunshafts, spotlights, 2D, 3D, or anything in between, these rays do it all! Use these to add interest to your scene, direct the player's eye to important locations, fill the scene with moody lighting, or just make your scenes even prettier!


Finally, LUMEN DYNAMIC RAYS use vertex colors and a custom shader to dynamically scale and contort the rays to a specific angle in real-time! Use these rays to track the sun dynamically, point rays at a moving target, or fake real-time volumetric lighting!


WHY MESH-BASED EFFECTS?

Built on a mesh-based, procedural material, Lumen throws out all of the calculations that most volumetric lighting solutions need by replacing the traditional mathematics with a simple vertex lit shader! This allows your effects to be calculated cheaply so that you can focus on the aesthetics of your scene, without worrying about the framerate decreasing. Beyond this, the lack of textures allows your disk space to be minimized without reducing the quality of the flares and rays that make your scene beautiful!


Powerful tools to light your world:

  • Scriptable object backend for quick and easy saving.
  • A fully 3D mesh-based workflow means that effects can be infinitely scaled with no loss in quality!
  • Dynamic and customizable depth fading that allows you to display and hide the light effects based on the depth of the scene.
  • Advanced camera fading that fades light effects in and out based on the distance to the camera.
  • Custom layering system for easy customization.
  • Lightweight shader built-in with GPU instancing support
  • The custom noise-based variation system smoothly interpolates light effects to a different color. Useful for everything from subtle, lazy light movement to sporadic, violent lighting.
  • Global, local, and per-layer controls give you ultimate control over the way that you want the light to render in your scene.
  • All shaders are built with Amplify Shader Editor for easy customization across Built-in and URP!

Come prepared with out-of-the-box features:

  • 42 Premade light effects
  • 89 Light shapes
  • Two main shader types
  • Full inspector extensions built with quick and easy editing in mind from the start
  • Fully supports Built-In and URP for any platform!

entry.title: Lumen: Stylized Light FX
entry.content:
将光线带回您的项目中，使用Lumen: 风格化光效！快速原型设计、保存、重新着色和实例化光晕和阳光射线，使用内置工具。

与我们联系：

网站 | 电子邮件 | Discord | 可玩演示

Distant Lands呈现：

Lumen: 风格化光效

创建美丽的风格化光效，从光晕到光环，再到神光和散射！Lumen是风格化游戏中高效体积光照的一站式解决方案。

特点三种不同的光源系统，共同作用以显著风格化您的游戏世界：

您场景中的光线是否显得平淡无奇？您想让观众感受到您游戏中光线的温暖吗？LUMEN光晕为您场景中的光源添加微妙的光环效果，提供类似于体积点光源的效果。这个效果可以极端化，使您的场景充满壮丽的光辉和强大的光环——这是任何玩家可能遇到的神秘物品的必备效果！

LUMEN静态光线是实现任何类型体积光线的简单方法。神光、阳光束、聚光灯、2D、3D或介于两者之间的任何东西，这些光线都能做到！使用这些光线为您的场景增添趣味，引导玩家的视线到重要位置，填充场景以营造氛围，或仅仅让您的场景更加美丽！


最后，LUMEN DYNAMIC RAYS 使用顶点颜色和自定义着色器，实时动态缩放和扭曲光线到特定角度！使用这些光线动态追踪太阳，指向移动目标，或伪造实时体积光照！

为什么选择基于网格的效果？

基于网格的程序材质构建，Lumen 通过用简单的顶点光照着色器替代传统数学，抛弃了大多数体积光照解决方案所需的所有计算！这使得您的效果可以以低成本计算，从而让您专注于场景的美学，而无需担心帧率下降。除此之外，缺乏纹理使得您的磁盘空间得以最小化，而不降低使您的场景美丽的光晕和光线的质量！


强大的工具点亮你的世界：

  • 可脚本化对象后端，便于快速和轻松地保存。
  • 完全基于3D网格的工作流程意味着效果可以无限缩放而不会损失质量！
  • 动态且可自定义的深度渐变，允许你根据场景的深度显示和隐藏光效。
  • 先进的相机渐变，根据与相机的距离淡入淡出光效。
  • 自定义分层系统，便于轻松定制。
  • 内置轻量级着色器，支持GPU实例化。
  • 自定义基于噪声的变体系统，平滑地将光效插值到不同的颜色。适用于从微妙、懒散的光移动到偶发、剧烈的照明。
  • 全局、本地和每层控制，给予你对场景中光线渲染方式的终极控制。
  • 所有着色器均使用Amplify Shader Editor构建，便于在内置和URP之间进行轻松定制！

准备好开箱即用的功能：

  • 42种预制光效
  • 89种光形状
  • 两种主要着色器类型
  • 从一开始就考虑快速和轻松编辑的完整检查器扩展
  • 完全支持任何平台的内置和URP！

entry.title: STORY - Wildlands Nature
entry.content:
This pack contains 49 unique assets to create your own adventure in the wildlands! Populate your environment with a variety of carefully handpainted nature assets to tell your own story.

The assets are compatible with Unity Terrain, which makes it easy for you to efficiently create what you envision. All assets are customizable regarding colors and wind movement - from a mild breeze in spring to a windy autumn day.

Contains a Demoscene and a Documentation to get you started!


Compatible with Unity 6.


Check out our Wildlands Bundle and save money: STORY - Wildlands Bundle


Features:


3D Assets:

  • 6 pine tree variations
  • 9 birch tree variations
  • 8 stones and 2 stone cliffs
  • 23 plants

Trees and stones have 3 LODs. All assets have a custom lightmap in the second UV channel.


Textures:

  • 1 Handpainted skybox
  • 2 tileable wood textures
  • 2 terrain textures
  • 6 atlases for plants
  • 3 types of grass
  • 3 textures for FX


Shaders:

Custom shaders were created using Amplify

  • Customizable shader for water
  • Customizable shaders for grass and tree leaves wind movement and color
  • Customizable shader for stone color and top projection
  • Simple doublesided shader for built-in version

FX:

  • Glowing particles effect
  • Godrays


Follow us for news

Web | Twitter | Facebook



Have a look at our other packs

STORY - 3D Packs Series

FANTASTIC - 3D Packs Series

content.xml:base: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/POLYGON Western Frontier - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty/ignore-index-en/

entry.content:
◼ Synty Discord Community ◼

Jump in to our Discord to Learn, Create and Share!


Synty Studios™ presents -


An Epic Low Poly asset pack of characters, props, weapons, vehicles and environment assets to create a western themed polygonal style game.


A great addition to POLYGON - Western Pack


Key Features -

329 unique assets with x4 alternative texture colors.


Assets

- Building assets (x42), Environment assets (x147), FX (x5), Generic assets (x9), Props assets (x87)


Vehicles (x3)

- Wagon Jail, Wagon Shop, Wagon Travel.


Characters (x21)

- Bandit Male, Captain Male, Gold miner Male, Gold miner Male, Hunter Male, Mexican Female, Mexican Male 01, Mexican Male 02, Native American Female 01, Native American Chief Male 01, Native American Elder Female 01, Native American Warrior Female 01, Native American Warrior Male 01, Native American Warrior Male 02, Native American Warrior Male 03, Priest Male 01, Salesman Male 01, Soldier Male 01, Thug Male 01, Thug Male 02, Traveler Female 01.

(with Alternative Colors)


Weapons (x15)

- Axe, Chain-gun, Gun stock, Hammer, Knife, Pickaxe, Revolver, Rifles, Rifle Bayonet, Rifle Stack, Shotgun, Spade, Spear, Sword.

- Heaps of awesome content included (see the layout screenshots for more details)


Check out our other Assets

  • POLYGON - 3D Asset Series
  • Mini - 3D Asset Series
  • Simple - 3D Asset Series

◼ Compatibility ◼

- Supports Universal Render Pipeline (URP) - URP Guide Here

- Characters are setup to work with Mecanim (no animations included in this pack)


📜 Synty Newsletter 📜

Don't miss out on release discounts!

entry.title: POLYGON Western Frontier - Low Poly 3D Art by Synty
entry.content:
◼ Synty Discord 社区 ◼

加入我们的 Discord，学习、创造和分享！

Synty Studios™ 介绍 -

一款史诗级低多边形资产包，包含角色、道具、武器、车辆和环境资产，用于创建西部主题的多边形风格游戏。

是 POLYGON - 西部包 的绝佳补充。

主要特点 -

329 个独特资产，具有四种替代纹理颜色。

资产

- 建筑资产 (x42)，环境资产 (x147)，特效 (x5)，通用资产 (x9)，道具资产 (x87)

车辆 (x3)

- 监狱马车、商店马车、旅行马车。

角色 (x21)

- 男盗贼、男队长、男淘金者、男猎人、墨西哥女性、墨西哥男性 01、墨西哥男性 02、美国原住民女性 01、美国原住民首领男性 01、美国原住民长者女性 01、美国原住民战士女性 01、美国原住民战士男性 01、美国原住民战士男性 02、美国原住民战士男性 03、男性牧师 01、男性推销员 01、男性士兵 01、男性暴徒 01、男性暴徒 02、女性旅行者 01。

(带有替代颜色)

武器 (x15)

- 斧头、链枪、枪托、锤子、刀、镐、左轮手枪、步枪、步枪刺刀、步枪弹夹、霰弹枪、铲子、矛、剑。

- 包含大量精彩内容（请查看布局截图以获取更多详细信息）


查看我们的其他资源

  • POLYGON - 3D 资源系列
  • 迷你 - 3D 资源系列
  • 简单 - 3D 资源系列

◼ 兼容性 ◼

- 支持通用渲染管线 (URP) - 这里是URP指南

- 角色已设置为与Mecanim兼容（此包中不包含动画）

📜 Synty 新闻通讯 📜

不要错过发布折扣！

关注我们以获取更新、促销、预览和教程：

entry.title: Low Poly Medieval Kit
entry.content:
Fuel your creativity with the Low Poly Medieval Kit. Designed for the seamless creation of low-poly medieval environments.

ⓘ Note: Before updating to the new version, ensure to back up your project if you are using the older one.


Package contains (378 unique assets):


  • Building Parts: Castle Bridges (6x), Castle Stairs, Castle Towers (4x), Castle Walls (5x), Gate Walls (5x).
  • Buildings: Bridge, Dock, Houses (9x), Mine, Sawmill, Towers (3x), Well, Windmill.
  • Vehicles: Cannon, Wooden Cart, Wooden Cart with sacks, Boat, Pirate Ships (2x).
  • Weapons: Axe, Bow, Bow Arrow, Bow Quiver, Bow Quiver with arrows, Hammer, Hatchet, Knife, Mace, Machete, Pickaxe, Shield, Spear, Sword.
  • Work Stations: Anvil, Anvil with Hammer and Horse Hoof, Crafting Tables (3x), Furnaces (2x).
  • Objects: Barrels (10x), Beds (3x), Benches (6x), Books (10x), Bowls (3x), Buckets (6x), Carpets (12x), Chairs (4x), Chests (2x), Crates (10x), Cups (5x), Dirt Grave, Empty Barrel, Flower Pots (5x), Fork, Logs (20x), Ladders (5x), Lanterns (5x), Potions (10x), Spoon, Stone Grave, Tables (5x), Wardrobes (5x), Boards (15x), Flags (10x), Floor Bricks (10x), Scrolls (5x), Signs (6x), Fences (18x).
  • Foliage: Trees (16x), Bushes (10x), Cactuses (5x), Dead Bushes (3x), Dead Trees (2x), Flowers (5x), Grass (5x),, Grass Patches (6x), Mushrooms (5x), Reeds (5x).
  • Stones: Stones (21x).
  • Terrains: Terrains (5x), Big Terrains (5x), Small Terrains (5x), Dirt Cliffs (3x), Grass Hills (5x), Roads (6x).
  • Water: Water Planes (2x), Big Water Planes (2x), Small Water Planes (2x).

Both Demo Scenes are included:


Main Demo Scene:

  • Explore the Main Demo Scene to see how the assets seamlessly integrate into different environments.

Showcase Demo Scene:

  • Take a closer look with the Showcase Demo Scene. See the fine details and unique features of each asset highlighted individuallly.

Features:

  • You can customize colors for the majority of assets, allowing you to adjust the appearance of your models to match different environments and themes.
  • Each model is equipped with pre-configured colliders for enhanced functionality.
  • Each prefab pivot is positioned at the model's center bottom, ensuring precise alignment.
  • Life-like proportions for an authentic experience.

All screenshots were made with the standard render pipeline with Unity 2022.3.18f1.


Compatibility:

  • Recommended for use with Unity 2022.3.18f1 and later versions.

For any support-related questions, you can contact me through this support link.


If you appreciate this asset, feel free to check out my additional works:


  • Stylized Western Kit
  • Stylized Vegetation Kit Pro
  • Stylized Nature Kit
  • Stylized Survival Kit
  • Low Poly Vegetation Kit Lite

Stay tuned for upcoming updates.

————————————————————

YouTube | Twitter | Instagram | Facebook

————————————————————


ⓘ For more information please check the "Technical details" section.

entry.title: Low Poly Medieval Kit
entry.content:
Fuel your creativity with the Low Poly Medieval Kit. Designed for the seamless creation of low-poly medieval environments.

ⓘ 注意: 在更新到新版本之前，请确保备份您的项目，如果您正在使用旧版本。

包内包含（378个独特资产）:

  • 建筑部件: 城堡桥（6个）、城堡楼梯、城堡塔（4个）、城堡墙（5个）、大门墙（5个）。
  • 建筑物: 桥、码头、房屋（9个）、矿井、锯木厂、塔（3个）、水井、风车。
  • 交通工具: 大炮、木车、装有麻袋的木车、船、海盗船（2个）。
  • 武器: 斧头、弓、箭、弓箭袋、装有箭的弓箭袋、锤子、斧子、刀、钉头锤、砍刀、镐、盾牌、矛、剑。
  • 工作站: 铁砧、带锤子和马蹄的铁砧、制作台（3个）、熔炉（2个）。
  • 物品: 桶（10个）、床（3个）、长椅（6个）、书（10本）、碗（3个）、桶（6个）、地毯（12个）、椅子（4个）、箱子（2个）、木箱（10个）、杯子（5个）、土墓、空桶、花盆（5个）、叉子、木头（20个）、梯子（5个）、灯笼（5个）、药水（10个）、勺子、石墓、桌子（5个）、衣柜（5个）、木板（15个）、旗帜（10个）、地砖（10个）、卷轴（5个）、标志（6个）、围栏（18个）。
  • 植被: 树（16个）、灌木（10个）、仙人掌（5个）、枯灌木（3个）、枯树（2个）、花（5个）、草（5个）、草地（6个）、蘑菇（5个）、芦苇（5个）。
  • 石头: 石头（21个）。
  • 地形: 地形（5个）、大地形（5个）、小地形（5个）、土崖（3个）、草丘（5个）、道路（6个）。
  • 水: 水面（2个）、大水面（2个）、小水面（2个）。

包含两个演示场景:


主演示场景:

  • 探索主演示场景，查看资产如何无缝集成到不同的环境中。

展示演示场景:

  • 通过展示演示场景仔细观察。查看每个资产的细节和独特特征，逐一突出显示。

特点:

  • 您可以为大多数资产 自定义颜色，使您能够调整模型的外观，以匹配不同的环境和主题。
  • 每个模型都配备了预配置的碰撞体，以增强功能性。
  • 每个预制件的支点位于模型的中心底部，确保精确对齐.
  • 逼真的比例，提供真实的体验。

所有截图均使用Unity 2022.3.18f1的标准渲染管线制作。

兼容性:

  • 推荐与Unity 2022.3.18f1及更高版本一起使用。

如有任何支持相关的问题，您可以通过此支持链接与我联系。

如果您喜欢这个资产，请随时查看我的其他作品:


  • 风格化西部套件
  • 风格化植被套件专业版
  • 风格化自然套件专业版
  • 风格化生存套件
  • 低多边形植被套件轻量版

敬请关注即将更新。

————————————————————

YouTube | Twitter | Instagram | Facebook

————————————————————

ⓘ 欲了解更多信息，请查看"技术细节"部分。
